channel.title: CVE Feed for Foliovision -- FV Flowplayer Video Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foliovision -- FV Flowplayer Video Player

item.title: CVE-2023-4520|2023-08-25T02:40:08.903Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: The FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘_fv_player_user_video’ parameter saved via the 'save' function hooked via init, and the plugin is also vulnerable to Arbitrary Usermeta Update via the 'save' function in versions up to, and including, 7.5.37.7212 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page, and makes it possible to update the user metas arbitrarily, but the meta value can only be a string.

item.title: CVE-2023-30499|2023-08-18T14:41:03.606Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in FolioVision FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin <= 7.5.32.7212 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-25066|2023-02-14T05:32:00.895Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in FolioVision FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin <= 7.5.30.7212 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32078|2024-06-04T17:51:57.255Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.44.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-32955|2024-04-24T07:05:43.260Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.43.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-35631|2024-06-07T17:19:16.514Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.45.7212.
